title: Raichu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Thunder Punch: Choose one player to attack with a thunder punch. Does nothing besides an attack. (âˆž uses)
- Encore: Use one of the abilities from **Pichu** or **Pikachu**. (1 use)
- Shock Wave: Redirect two players to a player of your choice. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Agility: You're capable of multitasking as long as you have enough uses.
- Concept of Evolution: Your attack value will be whatever your attack value was as **Pikachu** when you evolved.

desc:
Post 2303
*Despite being the evolution, it is often overshadowed by Pikachu.*
